MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA18 postcode area of Cumnock. It Is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:30pm after finding a fault on the overhead lines during planned works and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:03pm on Tuesday, 30 March 2021
